# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #74](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#74)

#### [chrismansellÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fpjen)

Do you ever see yourself writing in genres other than sf/f?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Eh...not likely. I like what I do too much. Maybe some light sf thrillers, a la Jurassic Park.
